app.name: InnerFriend
app.description: A privaxy-first tool for maintaining meaningful friendships based on Dunbar's number research

landing.heroDescription: Based on Dunbar's research, we kan only truly maintain about 5 intimate friendships, 15 klose friends, and 150 meaningful konnektions. Inner Friend helps you intentionally nurture the relationships that matter most.

intentionalLimits.title: Intentional Limits
intentionalLimits.description: Sience shows we have natural limits to meaningful relationships. Embrase them to fokus on who truly matters.

privateByDefault.title: Private by Default
privateByDefault.description: Your lists stay on your devise. Kreate an akount only if you want persistense and optional mutual matching.

mutualDiscovery.title: Mutual Diskovery⁵
mutualDiscovery.description: Optionally learn when someone you've listed as klose has also listed you — a gentle selebration of resiprosity.

mission.title: Fase Time, Not Ad Time
mission.description: We win when you leave our site — to share real moments with the people who matter most. When distanse separates you, we'll help you spark video kalls. But nothing beats being there.
mission.inspiration: Our inspiration: Dentyne Ice "Make Fase Time"

landing.quote: "Not all relationships are symmetrikal — and that's perfektly natural. The goal isn't perfekt balanse, but intentional presense."

tiers.innerDescription: Klose friends you see regularly (up to 15)
tiers.outerDescription: Good friends and extended sirkle (up to 50)
tiers.acquaintedDescription: People you know well enough to greet
tiers.nayborDescription: Trusted naybors for mutual aid and emergensies
tiers.parasocialDescription: Publik figures and kontent kreators you follow

feed.emptyCore: Add some Kores to see their posts here
feed.emptyInner: Add some Inners to see their posts here
feed.emptyOuter: Add some Outer+ to see their posts here

feed.outerTab: Outer Plus Feed - Extended sirkle inkluding naybors

naybor.sosDialogButton: Open Naybor SOS emergensy kontakt dialog
naybor.chooseNaybors: Kontinue to choose naybors to kontakt
naybor.locationDescription: When enabled, your approximate lokation will be shared with your naybors

language.communityTranslation: Join our kalmunity⁵ of translators to make InnerFriend aksessible to more people around the world.

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.

footer.tagline: Open sourse. Built with kare for meaningful koneksions.

contactImport.title: Import Kontakts
contactImport.description: Import kontakts from your phone, vKard file, or CSV/KSV spreadsheet. All kontakts will be added as Akquainted Kuzins.
contactImport.capacityFull: Your Akquainted tier is full. Promote some kontakts to make room.
contactImport.importingDescription: Adding kontakts to your Akquainted Kuzins...
contactImport.privacyNote: Your kontakt data stays on your device. We never upload or store it.
contactImport.defaultCountryHint: Phone numbers without a kountry⁵ kode will use this kountry⁵. Most kontakts are stored without kountry⁵ kodes.

promotionInfo.title: Easy Promotion Path
promotionInfo.description: All imported kontakts start as Akquainted Kuzins. You kan easily promote any kontakt to:

fromPhone.title: Import from Fone
fromPhone.description: Selekt kontakts from your fone's address book

fromVCard.hint: Aksepts .vcf or .vcard files from iKloud, Googol, Outlook
fromVCard.exportInstructions: Export kontakts from your email or phone app as a .vcf file, then import here.

fromCsv.mapColumnsDescription: Selekt which kolumns kontain your kontakt information:

columnMapping.name: Full Name Kolum
columnMapping.orSeparate: Or use separate first/last name kolums:

preview.title: Import Preview
preview.capacityWarning: Only {{available}} of {{total}} kontakts kan be imported. {{skipped}} will be skiped due to kapasity⁵ limits.
preview.duplicatesInfo: {{count}} kontakt(s) already exist in your friend list and will be skiped.
preview.promotionReminderDescription: You kan easily promote any kontakt to Kore, Inner, Outer, Naybor, or Role Model at any time.

success.title: Import Komplete!
success.description: {{count}} kontakts added to your Akquainted Kuzins.
success.promotionTip: Visit the Manage tab to promote kontakts to Kore, Inner, Outer, or other tiers.

error.title: Import Failed
error.generic: Unable to import kontakts. Please try again.

errors.notSupported: Kontakt Pikker is not suported on this device
errors.invalidVCardFile: Please selekt a valid vKard file (.vcf or .vcard)
errors.invalidCsvFile: Please selekt a valid CSV/KSV file
errors.noContactsFound: No kontakts found in the file
errors.nameColumnRequired: A name kolum is required to import kontakts

contactImport.mobileOnly: Kontakt Pikker is only available on mobile devices. Use vKard or CSV/KSV import instead.
contactImport.browserNotSupported: Your browser doesn't support Kontakt Pikker. Use vKard or CSV/KSV import instead.
contactImport.useFileImport: Try importing from a vKard or CSV/KSV file instead.

noPostsDescription.core: Your core friends haven't shared anything yet. Be the first to share something!
noPostsDescription.inner: Your inner circle friends haven't shared anything yet. Be the first to share something!
noPostsDescription.outer: Your outer circle friends haven't shared anything yet. Be the first to share something!

getStarted.core: Get started by adding up to 5 friends to your Core.
getStarted.inner: Get started by adding up to 15 friends to your Inner Circle.
getStarted.outer: Get started by adding up to 150 friends to your Outer Circle.

addToSee.core: Add up to 5 friends to see their posts here.
addToSee.inner: Add up to 15 friends to see their posts here.
addToSee.outer: Add up to 150 friends to see their posts here.

emptyState.addParasocialsHint: Add creators, celebrities, or figures you follow
emptyState.acquaintedHint: Friends are reclassified here through lack of contact over time
emptyState.roleModelsHint: Add people whose life stories inspire you to be good, better, best
emptyState.nayborsHint: Introduce yourself to your naybors and add them here
emptyState.addToCircleHint: Add someone to your closest circle

connections.requestsDescription: People who want to connect with you

roleModel.addDescription: Add someone whose life story inspires you — living or departed.
roleModel.whyRoleModel: Why is this person a role model?
roleModel.reasonPlaceholder: Describe what you admire about them, what traits you want to embrace, or how their story inspires you to be good, better, best...
roleModel.visibilityNote: This will be visible to your confirmed connections.
roleModel.editReasonDescription: Update why {{name}} is a role model to you.

reserved.deleteConfirmDescription: This will remove {{count}} reserved spot{{note}} from your {{tier}} tier.
reserved.editDescription: Update the number of spots and note for this reserved group.
reserved.notePlaceholder: Only you can see this. E.g., 'People from the hiking group'
reserved.notePlaceholderLong: Only you can see this. E.g., 'People from the hiking group' or 'Family members who prefer privacy'
reserved.addDescription: Reserve spots for people you don't want to explicitly list. Each group counts toward your {{tier}} limit but stays private.

addFriend.circleFullHint: To add someone here, you'll need to move a current {{tier}} friend to another tier first.
addFriend.emailHint: If they also list you as a {{tier}} friend and you both have notifications enabled, you'll both be notified of your mutual connection.
addFriend.phoneHint: Use this for the Tending feature to reach out to friends.
addFriend.nayborPhoneHint: Having contact info for your naybors is essential for emergencies and mutual support.
